summary: Traveling from France to Tangiers, a man looks to reunite with his former love, though their romance ended some 30 years earlier.
cast: Catherine Deneuve|Gérard Depardieu|Gilbert Melki|Malik Zidi|Lubna Azabal|Tanya Lopert|Nabila Baraka|Idir Elomri|Nadem Rachati|Jabir Elomri|Christophe Freudiger|Hicham Ibrahimi|Bouchaïd Kidi|Stéphane Rouabah
title: Otros tiempos
